channel.title: Can't edit first post in topic
channel.description:
Just noticed that I can't edit the first post in the topic about my book ([https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/getting-started-with-axoloti-the-book/122][1]). I can still edit other posts I made to that topic.
Just published the third chapter and I need to be able to change some things in that first post. Any ideas what is going wrong?
[1]: https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/getting-started-with-axoloti-the-book/122

item.title: Can't edit first post in topic
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Thanks. Looks like that was indeed the issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't edit first post in topic

item.title: Can't edit first post in topic
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

try now...
there was a limit of editing post for 86400 minutes = 60 days. (default for installation)
I've now disabled this, so editing is allowed indefinitely.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't edit first post in topic

item.title: Can't edit first post in topic
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

I just checked with this topic, that I created:

How to record knob modulation into a table and play it back? Patching
Hey Have been trying to record a LFO output signal to a table and then play it back. But I havent been succesful in making the table play it back right. I just dont know what I should use to "drive" the table play object. I tried with square lfo, constants, other lfos, etc. but it doesnt play the movement back in the way it is before it is recorded to table. Any ideas? Thanks [:wink:] Patch: .Table record live Test.axp (4.5 KB) [image]

I can edit the first post.

But a while ago I wanted to delete a first post/topic and I was not able to do that.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't edit first post in topic
